con:restRequest.con:request: { "ProfileId":"${#[Profile#AddProfileRGR#AddProfileRGR]#Response#$['ProfileId']}", "Prefix":"Mr.", "FirstName":"Rick", "MiddleInit":"", "LastName":"N", "CardNumber":"${=java.util.UUID.randomUUID()}", "Suffix": "", "GlobalOptOut": "FALSE", "GlobalOptDate": "6/26/2017 12:00:00 AM", "GlobalOptSource": "", "LanguageCode": "EN_US", "MaritalStatus": "S", "Gender": "F", "BirthDate": "1/22/1982 12:00:00 AM", "CompanyName": "Epsilon", "Addresses": [ { "AddressLine1":"123 THE RD", "AddressLine2": "# 3333", "AddressLine3": "", "City": "IRVING", "StateCode": "TX", "CountryCode": "USA", "PostalCode": "75080", "ChannelCode": "DM", "LocationCode": "H", "IsPreferred": "TRUE", "DeliveryStatus": "G", "DoNotStandardize": "FALSE" } ], "Emails": [ { "EmailAddress": "Test@dx2mail.co", "ChannelCode": "EM", "LocationCode": "B", "IsPreferred": "TRUE", "DeliveryStatus": "G" } ], "Phones": [ { "PhoneNumber": "5025101947", "PhoneCountryCode": "USA", "AcceptsText":"TRUE", "Frequency": "7", "ChannelCode":"SM", "LocationCode":"H", "IsPreferred": "TRUE", "DeliveryStatus":"G" } ], "SourceCode": "PP_WEB", "EnrollChannelCode": "WEB", "TermsConditionsAcceptedInd": true, "Username": "User_${=new java.text.SimpleDateFormat("yyyyMMddHHmmss").format(new Date())}", "Password": "Admin.123", "Status":"A" }
